item.title: JIRA API
item.description: golang jira client api Simple command line client for Atlassian’s Jira service written in Go. 搜索 JIRA 获取查询语句 https://community.atlassian.com/t5/Jira-questions/How-do-I-retrieve-issues-of-specific-status-with-JQL/qaq-p/540468 An easy way to get the proper encoding is to build your search in JIRA first When you have the results you want, click the Views button in Issue Navigator Right-click the XML link and copy the link address. It has all the proper formatting
